text: <@U67CNJZMZ>, got the payment method in, thanks! When I launched an instance of VScode in the cloud from Julia Hub I was expecting it to open in a tab but that didn't happen. I couldn't figure out how to access the instance. I know I can also run from my local vs code, but I have something running there already and wanted to check out the browser exeprience

text: Once the instance is ready, the `Connect` button will be enabled. Clicking that will open up the VSCode instance in a browser tab.

elements.text: Once the instance is ready, the
button will be enabled. Clicking that will open up the VSCode instance in a browser tab.

text: I'll note that currently the VSCode instance takes a looong time to get you to a REPL after it starts up. It's a one time problem (which we're fixing soon) but just wanted to give you a heads up.
